column2: # Fit baseline-category logit model  Believe ~ Gender + Race

vglm(formula = cbind(Yes, Undecided, No) ~ Gender + Race, family = multinomial(), 
    data = afterlife2_df)
No Hauck-Donner effect found in any of the estimates
# Question 2: "No" is baseline, and Female = 1, White =1

vglm(formula = cbind(Yes, Undecided, No) ~ (Gender == "Female") + 
    (Race == "White"), family = multinomial(), data = afterlife2_df)
No Hauck-Donner effect found in any of the estimates
